Package org.arl.fjage.persistence

Class Store

java.lang.Object
org.arl.fjage.persistence.Store
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class Store extends Object implements Closeable
Persistent storage API. The default store is in the user's home directory under a folder called ".fjstore", but may be changed using the setRoot(java.io.File) method.

  • Method Details

    • setRoot

      public static void setRoot(File folder)
      Sets root folder for store data.

    • setClassLoader

      public static void setClassLoader(ClassLoader cl)
      Sets class loader to use for loading stored classes.
      Parameters:
      cl - class loader to use, or null to use default

    • getInstance

      public static Store getInstance(Agent agent)
      Gets a store instance for an agent.

    • getId

      protected String getId(Serializable obj)
      Gets the ID for an object. If a getter "getId()" exists, it is used to get the ID of the object. Otherwise a SHA-256 hash of the serialized object content is used as an ID.

    • put

      public void put(Serializable obj)
      Stores an object.

    • load

      protected <T> T load(Class<T> type, File f)
      Loads a stored object from a file.

    • getById

      public <T> T getById(Class<T> type, String id)
      Gets an object in the store.
      Parameters:
      type - object class
      id - object ID
      Returns:
      object with given ID, or null if not found

    • getByType

      public <T> List<T> getByType(Class<T> type)
      Gets all objects of a given class in the store.
      Parameters:
      type - object class
      Returns:
      list of objects with specified class

    • remove

      public boolean remove(Serializable obj)
      Removes an object from the store.
      Parameters:
      obj - object to remove
      Returns:
      true if removed, false otherwise

    • removeById

      public <T> boolean removeById(Class<T> type, String id)
      Removes an object from the store.
      Parameters:
      type - object class
      id - object ID to remove
      Returns:
      true if removed, false otherwise

    • removeByType

      public <T> boolean removeByType(Class<T> type)
      Removes all objects of a given type from the store.
      Parameters:
      type - objet class
      Returns:
      true if removed, false otherwise

    • delete

      public boolean delete()
      Deletes the data store. All objects stored are removed. Once this method is called, the store is deleted and closed. The instance of the store should no longer be used.

    • size

      public long size()
      Gets the size of the data store (in bytes).

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the store. The instance of the store should no longer be used.
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
      Specified by:
      close in interface Closeable

    • closeQuietly

      protected static void closeQuietly(InputStream is)
      Closes input stream quietly.

      protected static void closeQuietly(OutputStream os)
      Closes output stream quietly.
